title: Avocado and sweetcorn salad
ingredients: ['500g frozen sweetcorn, thawed', '125g Spanish olives, sliced', '1 red pepper, chopped', '1 small red onion, chopped', '5 cloves garlic, minced', '4 to 6 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil', '4 tablespoons lemon juice', '3 tablespoons red wine vinegar', '1 to 2 tablespoons chopped fresh oregano', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '1/2 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper', '4 avocados - peeled, stones removed and diced']
